struct asmjit::CallNode
#include <compiler.h>

Function-call node.

Public Functions

CallNode(BaseCompiler * compiler, const Operand & target)

Create a new CallNode instance.

~CallNode()

Destroy the CallNode instance.

FuncDecl * getDecl()

Get function declaration.

Operand & getTarget()

Get target operand.

const Operand & getTarget()

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Operand & getRet(uint32_t i = 0)

Get return at i.

const Operand & getRet(uint32_t i = 0)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Operand & getArg(uint32_t i)

Get argument at i.

const Operand & getArg(uint32_t i)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.
